Craig Um when it comes to like how do we build more high performing teams I feel
like these are sociotechnical systems right and the from a technical
standpoint the thing that I feel like the starting point the tip of the spear is always reduce the amount of time
between when people are writing code and when it's in production make that feedback loop as short and as tight as
you possibly can because these are systems right these are feedback loops
every engineering or is a feedback So many feedback interwoven feedback loops And it what happens with these
amplifying feedback loops is the farther upstream you could make a change right It has these ripple effects as it goes
downstream And that loop between writing the code and seeing it in hopefully you're instrumenting it as you go You
know you look at it in production You're like is it doing what I expect Does anything else look weird It is a it is a
different company that does this in the order of minutes or small number of hours versus a large number of hours or
days or weeks or these are different companies right y so like from a
technical standpoint that's where I always tell people to that and this is somewhat self-interested obviously I care a lot about observability but like
observability is the the feedback loop right it is the sense making for
everything you do in production and the farther upstream you introduce introduce it the more reliably you can make sense
of your production systems as these feedback loop like shrink the loop between when you when you do something
when you can see what it's doing and make sure that you can actually see what it's doing are like the two things that I always tell people to start with I
also feel like there's this tendency you know in sociology they call it the FAE the fundamental attribution error to
like overestimate our control over the world and underestimate systems influence over us And where this
manifests in engineering works is we scrutinize individuals but what matters
is the team right What matters is what we can ship and support as a collective unit right Uh
and I also want to put this is not this is something that's very controversial in today's world like diverse teams are
resilient teams A monoculture could move super fast but it gets derailed You know

play with AI is outcomes over outputs right

um looking for ways to focus to identify outcomes and to focus on those
